markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 9"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Fey Magic](/Feats.aspx?ID=2640) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Sprite" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=238" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Ancestry Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=74) pg. 131 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

You can use faerie magic to hide yourself and expose hidden foes. You can cast [_faerie fire_](/Spells.aspx?ID=107) and [_invisibility_](/Spells.aspx?ID=164) each once per day as primal innate spells.
name: Fey Magic
